caption.p:
Summary of vaccine development paradigms and major types of vaccines. (a) Paradigms of vaccine development in a traditional condition vs during a pandemic.
5 (b) Snapshot of the vaccine landscape for COVID-19 with the different types of vaccine candidates in various clinical stages as of August 25, 2020.
10 (c) Schematic of major types of vaccines, including virus-based (weakened and inactivated), viral vector-based (replicating and nonreplicating), nucleic acid-based (DNA and mRNA), protein and peptide-based, and cell-based.
13
